dcterms:creator: NSSO
dcterms:description: A quarterly survey on employment issues conducted by the National Sample Survey Office (NSSO) of the Government of India, covering both rural and urban areas, with a panel structure for urban households to study transition processes in the labour market.
dcterms:title: Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS)

dcterms:creator: A. Deshpande
J. Singh
dcterms:description: A household survey that tracks individuals over time, focusing on women's labour market transitions and the dynamics of labour force participation.
dcterms:title: Consumer Pyramids Household Survey (CPHS)

dcterms:creator: S. Sarkar
S. Sahoo
S. Klasen
dcterms:description: A panel dataset used to analyze employment transitions of women in India, focusing on the low and decreasing Labour Force Participation Rate (LFPR) of Indian women.
dcterms:title: Indian Human Development Survey (IHDS)
